#include <stdio.h>
#define lim 100005
inline int inp()
{
    int noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;)
    {
     p=getchar_unlocked();
    };
    while(p>32)
    {
     noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
     p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
};
int p[lim];
int ispalin(int n)
{
 int t=n,s=0;
 while(t)
 {
  s=s*10+(t%10);
  t/=10;
 }
 return (n==s);
}
int main()
{
 int i,t;
 for (i=0;i<lim;i++)
 p[i]=ispalin(i);
 scanf("%d",&t);
 while (t--)
 {
    int n;
  //scanf("%d",&n);
    n=inp();
  while (!p[n])
  n++;
  printf("%d\n",n);
 }
 return 0;
}
